html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-03952020-05-26,  ,  ,  ECCC, 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectInterim Order Modifying the Operation of the Heavy-Duty Vehicle and Engine Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations (Trailer Standards)
PrecisINTERIM ORDER MODIFYING THE OPERATION OF THE HEAVY-DUTY VEHICLE AND ENGINE GREENHOUSE GAS EMISSION REGULATIONS (TRAILER STANDARDS) in order to (1) further delay the trailer standards by up to another year to allow the Department of the Environment to conduct further analysis; (2) allow more time to consult with all interested parties on a proposed approach for Canada; and (3) inform the Department on the path forward to consider whether Canada should maintain, amend or repeal its trailer standards.
AttachmentsAttachment
